sections.heading: Definitions; where found.For purposes of the Tobacco Products Tax Act, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 77-4002
sections.text: 01 to 77-4007 shall be used.SourceLaws 1987, LB 730, ยง 2;Laws 2009, LB89, ยง 2;Laws 2023, LB727, ยง 89;Laws 2025, LB9, ยง 11.Operative Date: January 1,
